questions.question: This arc is centered on a prison fortress in the Calm Belt and features Luffy's attempt to rescue his brother, Portgas D. Ace. What is...?
This arc revolves around Luffy and his crew's involvement in a massive conflict against Kaido and his forces. What is...?
This arc focuses on the backstory of Sanji and his connections to the Vinsmoke Family. What is...?
This technique, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows the user to create and manipulate poison. What is...?
This ability, often used by Monkey D. Luffy, drastically increases his speed and power, and changes his skin to a reddish color. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Blackbeard Pirates, allows the user to create and control earthquakes. What is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for his shadow-shadow fruit powers and large, looming presence. Who is...?
Known for his 'Fire Fist' attack, this character is the sworn brother of the Straw Hat Pirates' captain and had the Flame-Flame Fruit. Who is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for his sand manipulation powers and role as a key antagonist in the Alabasta arc. Who is...?
